main module

async main.home()[source]
async main.parse(file: bytes = File(Ellipsis))[source]

get pdf, parse it and return json with a specific format.

Args:

file (bytes, optional): resume pdf. Defaults to File(…).

Returns:
json: {

“name”: <name>, “email”: <email> “skills”: <an array of skills>

}
